message: Hello, Mr. Thorne, I'm nurse Sarah. I understand you were referred from urgent care. What brings you in today?

I'm turning yellow. My sister. Saw it first said, I looked like a giant lemon and this itching, it's unreal. Feels like there are ants under my skin. I haven't slept in two nights. I'm worried. It's my liver.
I have to go to work.
I'm sorry to hear your feeling that way. Have you had any nausea vomiting or pain in your upper right side since starting your recent medications?
